name: FreeWings
description:
Free Wings is a game for Smartphone and PC, made for the Global Game Jam 2022. It is a free arcade game relaxing. In this game you are a bird flying around the world (USA, France, Switzerland, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Oman)

Collect items and birds to make the best score.

On PC : Left and Right arrows on the keyboard, both to go down. Enter to start. 

On Smartphone : Touch the left side or the Right side of the screen, both to go down. Touch "Start" to play the game. 

Made by Dox

music by Maarten Schellekens (Ethereal Meditation)

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/maarten-schellekens

https://www.sound-fishing.net/sons/aigle

Font : Spartan
